meanings.sent1: I rereminded my friend about the meeting tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She rereminded herself to buy milk on the way home.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful squirrel rereminded the other animals of where he buried his acorns.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the church bells rereminded the town of the upcoming festival.
meanings.sent5: The teacher rereminded the students to study for the test next week.

meanings.sent1: He rereminded me of the promise I made long ago.
meanings.sent2: The old photograph rereminded her of her childhood adventures.
meanings.sent3: The cat rereminded the owner of its feeding time by meowing loudly.
meanings.sent4: The smell of fresh cookies rereminded him of his grandmother's baking.
meanings.sent5: The song rereminded her of the summer days spent at the beach.
